comments.text:
Instead of flyers, we're going to make a generic business card all college recruiters can hand out during career fairs.  We'd like help with the design of the card.  We like this design for one side but need the layout adjusted to fit a 3.5" tall x 2" wide card (it also has rounded edges):  http://intothefuzz.com/leetom/Affiliate%20Program/RECRUITING/PNG/recruiting_160x600_red_1.png  

So this would be a taller card, rather than a traditional card that is wider than it is taller - if that makes sense...

The backside of the card should include 
Company name: "mozilla"
URL:  college.mozilla.com
e-mail:  college@mozilla.com

Feel free to let me know if you have any questions.  Thanks for your help with this!

Hey hey !  thanks for the ping.

So, as long as this isn't intended to replace our/your official business cards, that's fine.  We can do a generic card to simply hand out with the general college@mozilla email address for more information vs. having this feel like actual official business cards.  we're in the process of rebranding those materials and want to make sure this is more of a special use case and a limited run vs. a new piece in our corporate identity.

sound good to you?

comments.author: kschlegelmilch@mozilla.com
jslater@mozilla.com
comments.creator: jslater@mozilla.com
comments.text:
(In reply to Rhonda Spencer from comment #4)
> Is there any graphic style you had in mind here? If not, I'll take the cue
> from the speaker, notebook, etc. graphics we did for the recruiting earlier
> this month and send you a few ideas.

Good questions. Generally speaking I think you can take inspiration from those other projects you did, but I have a few other thoughts that may help:
- sounds like the main branding here is Mozilla, not Firefox. That makes this trickier b/c we have fewer graphic elements to work with and a less defined visual style.
- Kimber, are you ok with us including the Firefox logo as an element? The example in comment #0 uses it, and I think that works...the text on the card could be all about Mozilla, but the Fx logo is very powerful and makes an impact.
- visually, I would encourage you to use those subtle background stripes we have on mozilla.com. I wouldn't use the blue color palette of the website, though, but we've used them with other colors as well...check out the example from comment #0 or http://blog.mozilla.com/userresearch/. I think the color palette from the example in comment #0 might work well for this.
- the universal Mozilla tab (check it out on mozilla.com or the blog I just referenced) could be good here. Not essential if it doesn't fit the design, but keep it in mind. (I have files for that and the stripes if you need them.)

Let me know if you want to discuss further...thanks!

- Kimber, are you ok with us including the Firefox logo as an element? The example in comment #0 uses it, and I think that works...the text on the card could be all about Mozilla, but the Fx logo is very powerful and makes an impact.

Let me know if you want to discuss further...thanks!

and re-sizing it to fit a business card.  And putting the college.mozilla.com URL in there somewhere.  I think those were the only changes we were thinking, though if you guys suggest others I know we are open to them.

comments.raw_text:
Looks like there may be some pdf artifacts in the Fx logo, but otherwise looks very good.

Does the Mozilla part go on the back, then? Seems like it might be crowded to add it here, but it should be on the card somewhere.

Kimber, what do you think?
comments.text:
Looks like there may be some pdf artifacts in the Fx logo, but otherwise looks very good.

Does the Mozilla part go on the back, then? Seems like it might be crowded to add it here, but it should be on the card somewhere.

Kimber, what do you think?

We took the "work for Mozilla" part off because it seemed to look cleaner without and I also really like the way it looks now that it's re-sized.  I do think it would be good to have it somewhere on the back instead (a mini-version perhaps).  Could we have it say "Join Mozilla" as opposed to "Work for Mozilla"?  It feels more inviting - and more encompassing of different types of student involvement (thinking about the student reps program here since we many have people ask about this when we do the career fairs).  

Also, I am wondering about the front and why there is a period after "And a better web"  since it's not a full sentence since there is also one after "Build your career" - should we just keep the one after "And a better web" or was there a reason for having two?  Sorry to get all picky...
comments.raw_text:

comments.raw_text:
Hey Rhonda - met with the rest of the team and here are a list of changes / additions we'd like to have done:

1.  We all liked the 2nd version with the italics.  In the yellow arrow on back, instead of "Work for Mozilla" we would like it to say "Connect with Mozilla"

2.  Content-wise, here are the things we want included on the side with the arrow -  Perhaps you can devise the most attractive day to display them? 

Mozilla College Recruiting [this would be the title/header on the back]
E-mail:  students@mozilla.com
Web:  college.mozilla.com
YouTube:  MozillaStudents
Twitter: MozillaStudents
IRC: #students (irc.mozilla.org)

3.  We are actually going to need two versions of the card made.  They will be exactly the same except 1 will not have the e-mail: students@mozilla.com listed.


Thank you, Rhonda!  And let me know if you have questions about our requests.

comments.raw_text:
Hey Rhonda - the printer noticed a small issue with the arrow on the backside of the card.  The Connect with Mozilla arrow needs to bleed to the left of the trim or it will move around slightly and not bleed on the card.  Can you please revise the art?

Thank you!
Kimber

comments.text: Closing.  Thanks Rhonda.
comments.raw_text: Closing.  Thanks Rhonda.

Hi There,

While planning for 2012 Fall recruiting, we would love to redesign the business cards for University recruiting. We will need the final printed product by Sep 10th. Thanks a lot for your help

1. Change "Mozilla College Recruiting" to "Mozilla University Recruiting"
2. Please change the main color and design if possible
3. We will keep the content as below

Email:students@mozilla.com
Web:https://mozilla.org/university/
YouTube:MozillaStudents

Thank you

Vivien

comments.raw_text:
Hi Rhonda,

Thanks a lot for your prompt response. Sorry that I have to make some changes to the request.

1. Timeline: we will need it by end of Aug. Our first trip to campus is Sep 11th and we will need some time to print the cards.
2. Change "Mozilla College Recruiting" to "Mozilla University Recruiting"
3. Please change the main color and design if possible. I uploaded the roll-up banner we are using this year. It can be some reference point when you redesign the card to make them be of the same theme family.
4. We will keep the content as below

Web:https://mozilla.org/university/
Email:students@mozilla.com

Thanks

Vivien

comments.text:
Hi Rhonda,

Thanks for the quick design. Please help make some changes as below:

1. For "Build your career and a better web", I prefer the layout on the old card or any similar design that is prettier and easier to read.

2. For "Mozilla University Recruiting", can you either make it capitalized or all in big letters?

3. Can you please take out "YouTube:MozillaStudents"

4. Can you please place Web before Email?

Thanks

Vivien

5: Center "Mozilla University Recruiting"

Thanks for your help

Vivien
